nodes.text: The trill beast was a small, dangerous species of animal from the planet Breshig, located in the Mandalore sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. A smuggler once left a sound chip of a pre-recorded trill beast inside their T-P-C4 Live Organism Comfort Conveyor to scare away customs officers onboard the luxury liner Alamintari. The smuggler was hiding ten kilograms of rare Garcornian spice inside.
